definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: grow fat (NH Hiph. id., also [[שֶׁמֶן]] Ar. samina be fat; Aram. 4men esp. der. spec. and deriv.; [[שְׁמֵין]] adj. fat: As. šammu, fat; Ph (Pun.) [[שמן]] oil, so Palm. [[שמנא]] Lzb:378; on relation of meanings Frä:147);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[שָׁמַ֫נְתָּ]] De 32:15 and Impf. 3 ms [[וַיִשְׁמַן]] v:De 32:15 both of Israel (prosperous and arrogant) under fig. of fat beast; so Pf. 3 pl. [[שָֽׁמְנוּ]] Je 5:28 (of wicked).

definitions.title: Hiph
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיַשְׁמִינוּ]] Ne 9:25 were sated and shewed fatness (inner causat.); Imv. ms. [[הַשְׁמֵן]] Is 6:10 make fat (dull, unreceptive), [[לֵב הָיָם הַוֶּה]].
